bug.author: edualvarado
bug.description:
OS: Ubuntu 16.04 AirSim 1.2 I am currently adding a Lidar sensor to my vehicle. I need a 2D Lidar, but when I change the number of channels to 1 in the settings.json file, the sensor won't show any points. Only when the number of channels are 2 or more it works. The position with respect to the vehicle seems fine to me. As I said, it works perfectly for 2 or more channels, being the points shown where I want. This is my current configuration for the Lidar: <denchmark-code> "Lidar1": { "SensorType": 6, "Enabled" : true, "NumberOfChannels": 1, "RotationsPerSecond": 10, "PointsPerSecond": 10000, "X": 0, "Y": 0, "Z": -0.15, "Roll": 0, "Pitch": 0, "Yaw" : 0, "VerticalFOVUpper": 0, "VerticalFOVLower": 0, "HorizontalFOVStart": 0, "HorizontalFOVEnd": 0, "DrawDebugPoints": true } </denchmark-code>
Am I maybe missing something? Thanks!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/edualvarado>@edualvarado</denchmark-link> -- Thanks much for reporting the issue. It is fixed now.
